item.title: Car keyboard control
item.description: Demo: Steering control Throttle control Progress Our team met on Sunday, 31 March 2019 to work on Assignment 3 - F1/10 Teleop. Following the directions in the assignment specifications and the lecture slides, we were successfully able to modify the provided talker.py and keyboard.py files to accept keyboard input and control the F1/10 vehicle. While modifying the keyboard.py file, we had to examine the curses python library to determine which key matched curses.
